cause.description:
I'm broke and am raising 700 dollars for my film for my portfolio for Cal Arts. Digital film, however financially responsible it may be, is blown out and saturated. I refuse it. Help me out man. I'm broke.
1. Digital Film Is Shitty
2. 16mm Looks Better
3. 16mm Is Expensive and John Campbell Needs Green
cause.name: Give John Campbell Money So He Doesn't Have To Shoot On Digital
